note:
I paint landscapes (which are depictions of mostly light and water and plants and rocks and air and how those things interact,) cityscapes (all of the above plus people, and what people make and destroy,) make sketchbooks, work with kiln-glass, explore materials, have an ongoing fascination with the intersection between tech and art and its possibilities, hope for the best, roll my eyes most days. pigments>pixels, but pixels can be awesome.

Still looking for my new home(s) on the web.
